subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Luke Rodgers scored in the 33rd minute to cap a six-minute scoring flurry and lift the Red Bulls to a 2-2 tie with the Colorado Rapids on Wednesday night in Harrison, N.J.
snippet: Luke Rodgers scored in the 33rd minute to cap a six-minute scoring flurry and lift the Red Bulls to a 2-2 tie with the Colorado Rapids on Wednesday night in Harrison, N.J.
